ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Active servers?
ygData.msgSnippet: My born on date was 4/1/99.  If you are coming back from after Kunark you ll find that the game is very different these days, but it is still fun.  I m in a
ygData.messageBody:
My born on date was 4/1/99. If you are coming back
from after Kunark you'll find that the game is very
different these days, but it is still fun. I'm in a
good guild and can get groups when I want to. I play
on Fenin Ro.

Quwi


--- David Kahan <trekkie61@...> wrote:

>
> The game is still pretty active. I play on Drinal
> (formally Tarew Marr). Sony is planning a new
> expansion in November.To:
> EverQuest@yahoogroups.comFrom:
> gollackdeathreaper@...: Thu, 28 Jun 2007
> 16:04:32 +0000Subject: [EverQuest] Active servers?

> I'm an old EQ player from the Kunark
> days who left for (shiver) EQ2
> then for another MMORG. I'm thinking of making a
> return to EQ1 as the
> bug to play seems to have left for the other
> game....tooo many kids
> and it's becoming a job. I remember many sleepless
> nights exploring
> Norath, Grinding with others on the plains of Karana
> and actually
> enjoying it. Anyone still out there? I've looked at
> the forum activity
> and wasn't very hopeful, but the game looks to be
> active as far as
> current expansions and whatnot.
>
>
